statements: UPDATE SaaS SET name = 'New Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SaaS SET description = 'New Description' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE SaaS SET name = 'Updated Name', description = 'Updated Description' WHERE id = 3;

UPDATE subscriptions SET end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE subscription_id = 1001;

UPDATE subscriptions SET price = 29.99 WHERE plan_name = 'Premium';
UPDATE invoices SET amount = 150.75, paid = TRUE WHERE sub_id = 123;
